messages.content: A comfortable time that has great tread for normal surfaces and power when I need it to clump steep hills.
Thanks for sharing these preferences! To help you best, could you please tell me which matters most to you: comfort, tread quality, or power on steep hills?
Tread quality.
Updated preferences: Tread quality is important.
Updated preferences to 1 points.

Yes, the Heybike Cityscape Electric Bike features 26" puncture-resistant tires with tread designed for good traction on typical road surfaces. It is equipped with dual disc brakes, which provide strong and reliable braking performance for safer stops during your commute.
